QuestData.Title: The Quest for Better Barley
QuestData.Description: Looking for sweet grain? My father once mentioned a malted cave barley that sounds about right.$b$bIf you are willing to brave the peril, there is an ancient cave at the base of the Winds' Edge south of here.$b$bThere is even an old lift my father made when he would travel into the jungle.$b$bIn the cave is a bush as old as my family. From that bush you can pluck a grain so sweet it will humble your senses.$b$bJust watch out for its guardians.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Malted Cave Barley at the base of the Winds' Edge.
QuestData.RewardText: Now THIS smells like the right stuff!
